settings.affilate_big_banner_title: Don't make costly mistakes at startup. We listen to your needs and provide expertise regarding equipment selection and layout design so you're ready to start training when you open your doors.
settings.affilate_big_banner_desc: Again Faster Equipment has supplied thousands of fitness affiliates and commercial gyms around the world since 2006. We are excited to help you design your new gym or upgrade your existing facility with the highest quality equipment at the best prices around.

settings.title: Pullup rings
settings.text: As the centerpiece of your gym, the Again Faster Competition Series lineup is sure to live up to its name. Featuring heavy-duty 11-gauge 3in x 3in uprights, this line has been designed in conjunction with top strength and conditioning athletes in mind.

settings.title: Bumper plates
settings.text: Our Crumb Rubber Bumper Plates have supplied thousands of gyms across the country with an affordable, yet durable bumper plate. For gyms looking for kilogram weightlifting plates, we also have a Pro Competition Series of bumpers.

settings.heading_big: Again Faster stands behind our products. Our barbells and rigs are guaranteed for life, and all products carry a strong warranty.
